Name: Barima-Waini
Description: Located in the northernmost part of Guyana, known for its coastal and forested areas.

Name: Cuyuni-Mazaruni
Description: A region rich in gold mining and known for its large unspoiled rainforests.

Name: Demerara-Mahaica
Description: Located along the Atlantic coast, including the capital city, Georgetown.

Name: Essequibo Islands-West Demerara
Description: Located on the southwestern side of the Demerara River, known for agricultural production and coastal towns.

Name: Mahaica-Berbice
Description: A region with a mixture of coastal plains and agricultural land, home to both rural and urban areas.

Name: Pomeroon-Supenaam
Description: Located in the southwestern coastal area, known for its rivers and agricultural activities.

Name: Upper Demerara-Berbice
Description: A region rich in natural resources, especially known for its mining and forested areas.

Name: Upper Takutu-Upper Essequibo
Description: Located in the southernmost part of Guyana, known for its indigenous communities and large tracts of rainforests.
